subject: Merry Christmas
post: 🎄 Wishing you a season filled with joy and warmth! 🌟 Houston General Hospital extends heartfelt Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays greetings to our cherished community. May this festive season bring you peace, good health, and moments of togetherness with loved ones. As we reflect on the past year, we express gratitude for your trust and support. May the coming year be filled with prosperity and renewed hope. From our hospital family to yours, Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays! 🎅🏥🎁 #SeasonsGreetings #HoustonGeneralHospital #MerryChristmas #HappyHolidays

subject: Houston General is Hiring!
post: 🏥 Exciting News! Houston General Hospital is expanding its family! 🌟 We are thrilled to announce that we are actively hiring passionate and dedicated individuals to join our dynamic team. If you're committed to delivering exceptional healthcare and making a positive impact, we invite you to explore career opportunities with us. Your expertise can contribute to our mission of providing quality care to our community. Join Houston General Hospital in shaping a healthier future together! 💙👩‍⚕️👨‍⚕️ #HiringNow #HealthcareCareers #JoinOurTeam #HoustonGeneralHospital
